main event: Multiple UFO sightings were reported over Colorado Springs, Colorado, between March 8 and March 31, 1966, involving various objects observed by civilians.
interesting points: Witnesses observed fluctuating lights in the sky that changed color and position rapidly,One sighting lasted for an hour, with four colored lights visible,Another report involved a round, grapefruit-sized object described as white and green,One witness reported an egg-shaped object resembling a pineapple with legs observed for 1.5 hours,All sightings were reported to the Air Force's Project Blue Book for investigation.
sighted object: Various objects including colored lights, a grapefruit-sized object, and an egg-shaped object
witness description: Civilians, including an astronomy club looking for comets
